segments.text: Hi . This is the Customer Service . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I bought one of your vacuums from spend-wart . It ’ s broken now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . I bought it four months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is still covered by our warranty . Tell me the mode number of your vacuum , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . The model number is 6594 - c .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s your address , your name and your phone number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 906 Ottawa street . My name is David Yang . My phone number is 713-786-0234 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . There are two Customer Service Offices in your area . The nearest one is Chadwick and Hacks Appliances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me where the office is located ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I know that place . It ’ s only two minutes drive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to call the office first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Thank you very much for your help .
segments.speaker: S2
